Class Entrada

  • java.lang.Object
    • Entrada

  • public class Entrada
extends java.lang.Object
    Class Entrada - input class for input of simple input types via simple dialog box. eg. int, char, String, double or boolean.
    Version:
    1.3 Modified (Aug 12, 2003): Portuguese version, added methods without parameters.
    Author:
    Bruce Quig, Michael Kolling, Eugene Ageenko, Marcelo de G. Malheiros

        prompt - message to appear in dialog
        trueText - message to appear on true "button"
